content.question: Fluid <math alttext="X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">X</mi></math> has density <math alttext="rho sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>ρ</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></math> and Fluid <math alttext="Y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">Y</mi></math> has density <math alttext="the fraction 3 rho sub 0 over 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><msub><mi>ρ</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mstyle></math>. A volume <math alttext="V" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>V</mi></math> of Fluid <math alttext="X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">X</mi></math> and a volume <math alttext="2 V" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn><mi>V</mi></math> of Fluid <math alttext="Y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">Y</mi></math> are added to a container and mixed together. Assume the total volume of the mixture is equal to the sum of the volumes of the fluids. Which of the following correctly describes the average density <math alttext="rho sub average" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>ρ</mi><mtext>avg</mtext></msub></math> of the fluid mixture?

choices.label: <math alttext="rho sub average is less than rho sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>ρ</mi><mtext>avg</mtext></msub><mo><</mo><msub><mi>ρ</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="rho sub average equals rho sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>ρ</mi><mtext>avg</mtext></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>ρ</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="rho sub 0 is less than rho sub average, which is less than 2 rho sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>ρ</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mo><</mo><msub><mi>ρ</mi><mtext>avg</mtext></msub><mo><</mo><mn>2</mn><msub><mi>ρ</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="rho sub average is greater than or equal to 2 rho sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>ρ</mi><mtext>avg</mtext></msub><mo>≥</mo><mn>2</mn><msub><mi>ρ</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="rho sub 0 is less than rho sub average, which is less than 2 rho sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>ρ</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mo><</mo><msub><mi>ρ</mi><mtext>avg</mtext></msub><mo><</mo><mn>2</mn><msub><mi>ρ</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
